item.description:
Dear Goddesses,

Spring Dance as a beautiful and organic way to integrate body, mind and soul with movement. Spring Dance is a moving celebration that will have you loving your body and loving your life. Weaving simple, guided movement sequences and free exploration, Spring Dance reconnects you with your innate state of joyous well- being. The mind becomes clear, free and positive and your body feels supple, energized and powerful. This powerful form of movement invites you out of your mind and into your heart and your body.

Plan to celebrate Spring in our wonderful circle!

2pm - 3:30 pm
$10
item.name: Spring Circle
